lead_paragraph: Texas A&M’s president, R. Bowen Loftin, called the Big 12 board chairman notifying the league it will formally withdraw, very likely on Tuesday.
snippet: Texas A&M’s president, R. Bowen Loftin, called the Big 12 board chairman notifying the league it will formally withdraw, very likely on Tuesday.
